import warnings
from sklearn.exceptions import DataConversionWarning
warnings.filterwarnings(action='ignore', category=DataConversionWarning)
import pandas as pd 
import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt 
pd.set_option('display.precision',3)
pd.options.display.float_format = '{:20,.2f}'.format
from plotly import __version__
from plotly.offline import download_plotlyjs, init_notebook_mode, plot, iplot
print(__version__) # requires version >= 1.9.0
import cufflinks as cf
# For Notebooks
init_notebook_mode(connected=True)
cf.go_offline()
%matplotlib inline
source.3072b07c:
df=pd.read_csv('../input/global-space/Global Space Launches.csv')
df.rename(columns = {' Rocket':'Rocket'}, inplace = True) 
#df['Rocket'].fillna(0,inplace=True)
df['Rocket']=df['Rocket'].replace('.', '')
df['Rocket']=df['Rocket'].replace(',', '')
df['Rocket']=df['Rocket'].replace({'5,000.0 ':'5000','1,160.0 ':'1160'})
df['Rocket']=df['Rocket'].astype('float64')

df1=df[df['Status Mission']=='Success']
df2=pd.DataFrame(df1.groupby('Country of Launch')['Status Mission'].count())
#df2.reset_index(level=0, drop=False,inplace=True)
df2.sort_values(by='Status Mission',ascending=False).iplot(kind='bar',title=' countries wherein successful launches have taken place over the years.')
source.9aac5b0f:
df1 = df[df['Private or State Run']=='P'].groupby(['Company Name']).size().reset_index(name='Counts').sort_values(by='Counts',ascending=False)
df1.reset_index(drop=True, inplace=True)
df1.sort_values(by='Counts',ascending=False).head(10).iplot(kind='scatter',x='Company Name',y='Counts',title="Major Player in Private Sector in Space Industory")
source.fd736684:
# Most collaborative organisation
ax = sns.countplot(x="Company Name", data=df[df['Companys Country of Origin'] != df['Country of Launch']], 
                   order = df["Company Name"].value_counts()[:5].index)
ax.set_xlabel("Companies",fontsize=14)
ax.set_ylabel("No. of Other-origin country",fontsize=14)
plt.show()
source.bb7d6af8:
#Failures and time of the day
# 12 AM to 6 AM = late Night, 6 AM to 12 PM = Morning, 12 PM to 6 PM = Afternoon, 6 to 8 PM = Evening, 8 PM to 12 AM = Night

from datetime import time
a=lambda x: int(str(x).split(':')[0])
df['Hour'] = df['Time'].apply(a)
df['Time1'] = pd.cut(df['Hour'], 
                    bins=[0,6,12,18,20, 24], 
                    include_lowest=True, 
                    labels=['Late Night','Morning','Afternoon','Evening', 'Night'])
df2 = df[df['Status Mission']=='Failure'].groupby(['Time1']).size().reset_index(name='Counts').sort_values(by='Counts',ascending=False)
df2.reset_index(drop=True, inplace=True)
df2.iplot(kind='scatter',x='Time1',y='Counts',title='Failure Time Wise for Various Launches')

df_com.fillna(0,inplace=True)
